channel.title: Can't wait to play the game
channel.description: I can't wait to play this game. It has a really good concept and I wish i had the money to buy it before the closed alpha. I saw it before and forgot about it but for some reason I remembered it today and I read the entire wiki. This is one of my most hyped games. I wish i could find the money for a steam code because i could see myself putting alot of hours into this game, especially since the developers want to continually support it. Once I get the money or find a steam code, expect to see me hanging around these forums and the game alot because this definitely has all of my hype.

item.title: Can't wait to play the game
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

You could probably buy an Alpha code off of a backer with a spare one

I’m going to include in the email that the keys are not meant for resale, but if you are looking to sell “for charity” to someone that can’t afford a key for a few bucks, that’s 100% fine: I’m mostly including that note for sketchy sites like G2A.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't wait to play the game

item.title: Can't wait to play the game
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
You could probably buy an Alpha code off of a backer with a spare one. Asking @TurdPile or another high-tier backer if you could buy one may be a good idea.

item.title: Can't wait to play the game
item.dc:creator: emporerpineapple
item.description:
I can’t wait to play this game. It has a really good concept and I wish i had the money to buy it before the closed alpha. I saw it before and forgot about it but for some reason I remembered it today and I read the entire wiki. This is one of my most hyped games. I wish i could find the money for a steam code because i could see myself putting alot of hours into this game, especially since the developers want to continually support it. Once I get the money or find a steam code, expect to see me hanging around these forums and the game alot because this definitely has all of my hype.
